title: Regular SE(3) Group Convolutions for Volumetric Medical Image Analysis. (arXiv:2306.13960v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Regular group convolutional neural networks (G-CNNs) have been shown to increase model performance and improve equivariance to different geometrical symmetries. This work addresses the problem of SE(3), i.e., roto-translation equivariance, on volumetric data. Volumetric image data is prevalent in many medical settings. Motivated by the recent work on separable group convolutions, we devise a SE(3) group convolution kernel separated into a continuous SO(3) (rotation) kernel and a spatial kernel. We approximate equivariance to the continuous setting by sampling uniform SO(3) grids. Our continuous SO(3) kernel is parameterized via RBF interpolation on similarly uniform grids. We demonstrate the advantages of our approach in volumetric medical image analysis. Our SE(3) equivariant models consistently outperform CNNs and regular discrete G-CNNs on challenging medical classification tasks and show significantly improved generalization capabilities. translated_title: 基于正则化SE(3)群卷积的体积医学图像分析
translated_abstract: 研究表明，正则组卷积神经网络(G-CNN)可以提高模型性能并提高对不同几何对称性的等变性。本文解决了SE(3)问题，即旋转平移等变性在体积数据上的问题。体积图像数据在许多医疗设置中普遍存在。受可分离组卷积的最新工作的启发，我们设计了一个SE(3)群卷积核，将其分解为连续的SO(3)（旋转）核和空间核。我们通过采样均匀的SO(3)网格来近似连续设定下的对称性。我们的连续SO(3)核是通过类似均匀网格的RBF插值参数化的。我们展示了我们的方法在体积医学图像分析中的优势。我们的SE(3)等变模型在具有挑战性的医学分类任务上始终优于CNN和常规离散G-CNN，并显示出显着改进的泛化能力。我们的方法在噪声数据下的性能提高了达到16.5%。
tldr: 本文提出了基于正则化SE(3)群卷积的体积医学图像分析方法，通过分解连续SO(3)核和空间核以实现旋转平移等变性，并在医学分类任务中获得了显著性能提升。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a regular SE(3) group convolution-based method for volumetric medical image analysis, which achieves roto-translation equivariance by separating continuous SO(3) and spatial kernels, and shows significant performance improvements on challenging medical classification tasks.
